name: Akuma The Killer
description:
You are an anti-social psycopath who hates every living being. And for your lucky an experiment about psychopathic behavior is being made in this town and you are subject 0.

You've trained your whole life to make your will become truth.
Now your time has come, bathe in their blood. Bring terror upon this town. Don't let anyone stop you.

This game is still in development but you can help me get it done faster by buying this version. You will get access to every update I'll be making in the game! Thank you. :)
